column3:
On Saturday, Amy and Joe baked a whole chicken for their family's dinner.  They rinsed it
ewlinein cold water, rubbed it with spices, and put it into a pan.  After they had heated up the
ewlineoven, they put the chicken and the pan on the center oven rack and set the timer.  Then,
ewlineas they peeled potatoes and carrots to go with the chicken, Amy, Joe and Cindy talked
ewlineabout dinner.
ewline
ewlineAmy said, "Joe, this is too much food for you, me and little Cindy to eat in one night.
ewlineWe'll have leftovers.  What can we do with the leftover chicken?"
ewline
ewlineJoe said, "We could make chicken sandwiches or chicken and rice."
ewline
ewlineAmy said, "How about chicken soup?"
ewline
ewlineCindy said, "I like chicken with Thai noodles with red peppers.  We haven't made those in
ewlinea long time." 
ewline
ewline"That sounds good," said Amy.  "We'll make that for dinner tomorrow."
ewline
ewline"Yum!" said Joe.  "That's a great idea.  I love Thai noodles."
ewline
ewlineLater, Joe, Amy and Cindy had finished eating dinner, and Cindy asked Amy for help with
ewlineher homework.  "I don't understand how to do these math problems!"
ewline
ewlineJoe said, "You two go ahead.  I'll do the dishes and put away the leftovers."
ewline
ewlineSoon, Cindy went into the kitchen to get a glass of water.  Joe was eating the chicken.
ewlineIt was almost gone!
ewline
ewline"Dad!" said Cindy, "You have eaten almost all of the leftover chicken. We can't have Thai
ewlinenoodles with chicken tomorrow."
ewline
ewlineJoe looked very sad.  He said "I'm sorry.  I have been a bad dad.  I have to buy more
ewlinechicken so that we can still have noodles.  Would you like a piece of chicken?"
column4: multiple: What is the family planning to have for dinner tomorrow?
column8: Thai noodles with chicken and red peppers
column9: one: What kind of homework does Amy need help with?
column14: multiple: Why did Joe feel sad?
column15: Because Cindy wanted Amy to help her with her homework
column16: Because the chicken was no good
column17: Because he ate an ingredient needed for tomorrow's dinner
column18: Because Cindy went to get a glass of water
column19: one: What did Amy, Joe and Cindy have for dinner?
